adjective.label: Adjective
adjective.description: a word or phrase naming an attribute, added to or grammatically related to a noun to modify or describe it.

person.label: Person
person.description: a human being regarded as an individual.

noun.label: Noun
noun.description: a word used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things.

pluralnoun.label: Plural Noun
pluralnoun.description: a word used to identify many of a class of people, places, or things.

number.label: Number
number.description: an arithmetical value representing a particular quantity and used in counting and making calculations and for showing order in a series or for identification.

shapes.label: Shapes
shapes.description: the external form, contours, or outline of someone or something.

food.label: Food
food.description: any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink or that plants absorb in order to maintain life and growth.

vegetables.label: Vegetables
vegetables.description: a plant or part of a plant used as food, typically as accompaniment to meat or fish, such as a cabbage, potato, carrot, or bean.

fruits.label: Fruits
fruits.description: the sweet and fleshy product of a tree or other plant that contains seed and can be eaten as food.

verb.label: Verb
verb.description: a word used to describe an action, state, or occurrence.

emotion.label: Emotion
emotion.description: a natural instinctive state of mind deriving from one's circumstances, mood, or relationships with others.

verbed.label: Verb-ed
verbed.description: a word used to describe an action, state, or occurrence ending in ed.

state.label: State
state.description: a nation or territory considered as an organized political community under one government.

propernoun.label: Proper Noun
propernoun.description: a name used for an individual person, place, or organization, spelled with initial capital letters, e.g., Larry, Mexico, and Boston Red Sox.

relative.label: Relative
relative.description: a person connected by blood or marriage.

activity.label: Activity
activity.description: a thing that a person or group does or has done.

restaurant.label: Restaurant
restaurant.description: a place where people pay to sit and eat meals that are cooked and served on the premises.

verbpasttense.label: Verb Past Tense
verbpasttense.description: a word used to describe an action, state, or occurrence that occurred in the past.

month.label: Month
month.description: A month is a unit of time, used with calendars, which is approximately as long as a natural period related to the motion of the Moon
